posts.title: Groundbreaking Ceremony
posts.content: We officially broke ground on the site today. Exciting times ahead!
posts.author: Agostino Scholes & Team

posts.title: Foundation Work Begins
posts.content: Excavation and laying of the buildingâ€™s foundation is now underway.
posts.author: Agostino Scholes & Team

posts.title: Structural Framing
posts.content: Steel framing is going up quickly. The skeleton of the building is taking shape.
posts.author: Agostino Scholes & Team

posts.title: Electrical and Plumbing Installations
posts.content: Our crews have started roughing in the electrical wiring and plumbing systems.
posts.author: Agostino Scholes & Team

posts.title: Roofing Completed
posts.content: The roof is now complete! We are safe from the elements and moving to interior finishes.
posts.author: Agostino Scholes & Team
